title: Meat vs. No Meat
itunes:title: Meat vs. No Meat
description:
In this episode, Bobby and Sophie tackle an ever evolving debate: Meat vs No Meat. Bobby and Sophie discuss their thoughts on alternatives meat products, their preferences for vegtable dishes, and listen to the end to hear how Sophie enjoy’s Bobby’s veggie burger, inspired by an episode of Beat Bobby Flay. 

For more information on “Always Hungry” follow the hosts on Instagram: 

Bobby Flay’s page: https://www.instagram.com/bobbyflay

Sophie Flay’s page: https://www.instagram.com/abc7sophie

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
